Associate Professional Services Consultant Intern 2025- UAE National, AWS
Job ID: 2812507 | Amazon Web Services EMEA Dubai FZ Branch - Q29
Location: ARE, Dubai
Posted: December 19, 2024 (Updated about 9 hours ago)
Description: The AWS internship program will start in June /July 2025 and focused on Penultimate year students who graduate in 2026. Candidates must be UAE National with family book. Basic qualifications include being in the penultimate or final year of Computer Science or related fields, experience with programming languages like Java, Python, etc., and understanding of Networking fundamentals, Security, Storage or Databases. Preferred qualifications include returning to degree after internship and availability to work full-time for 12 weeks.
